message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking $160 for it.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $160 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $105. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $140.  This product is really high-quality, and I believe it's worth the price.
Alice, I understand you're firm on the quality, but $140 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $120.  Let's see if we can make this work.
